# mdsr <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="139" />

![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/mdsr-book/mdsr/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)
[![CRAN\_Status\_Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/mdsr)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=mdsr) 
[![CRAN RStudio mirror downloads](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/mdsr)](https://www.r-pkg.org/pkg/mdsr)

A complement to the CRC Press book [*Modern Data Science with R*](https://mdsr-book.github.io/). 

To install it, try:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("mdsr")
```

The most recent version can always be installed directly from GitHub:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("mdsr-book/mdsr")
```

Older versions of the package can be downloaded and installed via the [CRAN archive](https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/mdsr/).

Load the package (like any other) with 

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(mdsr)
```

## Cite

```{r}
citation("mdsr")
```
